Package org.example.grade_predictor.controller.components

Class EnrolledUnitComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
org.example.grade_predictor.controller.components.EnrolledUnitComponentFactory
public class EnrolledUnitComponentFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating UI components for EnrolledUnit display
